verses.verse: And in that day <WH3117> thou shalt say <WH559>, O LORD <WH3068>, I will praise <WH3034> thee: though thou wast angry <WH599> with me, thine anger <WH639> is turned away <WH7725>, and thou comfortedst <WH5162> me.

Behold, God <WH410> is my salvation <WH3444>; I will trust <WH982>, and not be afraid <WH6342>: for the LORD <WH3050> JEHOVAH <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and my song <WH2176>; he also is become my salvation <WH3444>.
Therefore with joy <WH8342> shall ye draw <WH7579> water <WH4325> out of the wells <WH4599> of salvation <WH3444>.

And in that day <WH3117> shall ye say <WH559>, Praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068>, call <WH7121> upon his name <WH8034>, declare <WH3045> his doings <WH5949> among the people <WH5971>, make mention <WH2142> that his name <WH8034> is exalted <WH7682>.
Sing <WH2167> unto the LORD <WH3068>; for he hath done <WH6213> excellent things <WH1348>: this is known <WH3045> <WH3045> in all the earth <WH776>.
Cry out <WH6670> and shout <WH7442>, thou inhabitant <WH3427> of Zion <WH6726>: for great <WH1419> is the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478> in the midst <WH7130> of thee.
